item.title: Supported Metrics

item.title: Change Logs
item.description: Changes in v11.1.139b394 (Oct 26 2020) improves EMEdge logging logs to both screen and emedge.log fix on APM index names to include prefix obsolete flat file netgain/alarm/AlarmHistoryManager.java as it is causing issues enhance alarm views update default SIEM security threat dashboard Changes in v11.1.136b388 (Oct 24 2020) add jump to SIEM Threat Event from SIEM alarms obsolete AlarmEscalateManager module enhance current and history alarms view improves some CSS look and feel Changes in v11.
